name: hashtag aesthetic
description:
a top-down dodger made in three days for a school project

-

CONTROLS
mouse to aim
click+hold to thrust
space to boost

OBJECTIVE
touch the lighted goals
avoid enemies get good

-

CREDITS
BGM: Pearlbot VS Peribot - Aivi & Surasshu https://soundcloud.com/aivisura/151009-mixdown-165...
SFX: 05706 dinging interface sounds - Robinhood76 https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/26...
